alert.note: Alert for Amherst (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 2:26PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Amherst County through 300 PM EDT... At 226 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clifford, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clifford... Lowesville... New Glasgow... Riverville... and Piney River. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
